meanings.definition: A malignant tumor of lymphoid tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with lymphosarcomas.
meanings.sent2: Lymphosarcomas can be life-threatening if not treated early.
meanings.sent3: The lymphosarcomas decided to throw a party in the lymph nodes.
meanings.sent4: Her lymphosarcomas spread like wildfire through her body.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lymphosarcomas haunted his dreams.

meanings.definition: A cancer of the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent1: Treatment for lymphosarcomas often involves chemotherapy.
meanings.sent2: She bravely fought against lymphosarcomas and won.
meanings.sent3: The lymphosarcomas tried to sneak into the lymph nodes unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of lymphosarcomas clouded her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The battle against lymphosarcomas was long and arduous.

meanings.sent1: The biopsy confirmed the presence of lymphosarcomas in the lymphocytes.
meanings.sent2: Lymphosarcomas can be challenging to detect in early stages.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lymphosarcomas played hide and seek in the lymph nodes.
meanings.sent4: The growth of lymphosarcomas mirrored the growth of a tangled vine.
meanings.sent5: The doctor illustrated the spread of lymphosarcomas using a diagram.
